definitions.definition: The opening in reptiles , amphibians and birds , as well as elasmobranchians , lobe-finned fishes , marsupials and monotreme mammals , which serves as the common outlet for the urogenital ducts and rectum .
A duct through which gangrenous material escapes a body .
Structure in the embryo during the development of the reproductive and urinary systems.

secondary_definitions: ( anatomy , zoology ) The opening in reptiles , amphibians and birds , as well as elasmobranchians , lobe-finned fishes , marsupials and monotreme mammals , which serves as the common outlet for the urogenital ducts and rectum .
( anatomy ) A duct through which gangrenous material escapes a body .
( embryology ) Structure in the embryo during the development of the reproductive and urinary systems.
